@NeatoRARE It can't be the first one since one of the doujins that got nuked was the JP raws & that series wasn't licensed. It might be the 2nd one, but if they're going to nuke longbows doujins, I don't see why a couple survived. The takedowns were too random IMO & yeah fuck fakku.

@Zach_kuro Except you left out the "complaining" part on that quote. Also, you totally ignored the call-out on you acting entitled for reading free stuff, nor did you answer the question on whether you've ever supported an artist. But at least you understand the artist's situation with the whole CCP shit they had to deal with.

@LunaticSeibah hhhhmmm yeah perhaps i misjudge it. didn't know the author was chinese then i remember there's a strict censorship rule in china well i apologise for that misunderstanding earlier

@LunaticSeibah *calls someone sad and riled up* proceeds to @ a stranger in the comments minding his own bussiness because he got riled up on a guy who uses the intended purpose of a comment section.... yyyyeahhh you do you bro
@LunaticSeibah "Im not the guy who writing paragraphs on this website" *proceeds to write a whole ass essay of bootlicking a doujin that's longer than my comments......... bruh

Also fuck Fakku
The only reason I could think for any doujin to get deleted off this site is if it's an official translation or perhaps a DMCA notice/takedown
@I Eat Orphan. Nhentai deleted them for reasons unknown to me. In fact, I also saw a couple of doujins from other artists get deleted, so it was definitely a whole site purge.

@Zach_kuro Also, you're complaining as if you paid for the artist's works. Calling the artist a pussy while you read their stuff for free. You sure sound really entitled right now when you have no right to be. I at least buy the physical copies of doujins I like to support the artist. Have you ever supported any of the artists of the doujins you all have favorited? #349495 Is one of my physical copies I scanned & uploaded (I ended up destroying it to properly scan it though)

@Zach_kuro Hey, I'm not the guy writing paragraphs on this website complaining & assuming I'm praising this as peak fiction (That's a really high bar btw). But hey sorry if calling you sad got you all riled up but c'mon you made three comments complaining. Small input for the rest of the readers, including you. The artist is Chinese & I certainly won't be surprised if CCP prosecutes people who draw pussies like they committed war crimes. It's a shame, but that's just how it is.

@Mesa is a Sussy Baka. I do it for free as a hobby, but I don't take commissions. I don't want to be put under time restraints. You can give suggestions & if I like it, I might put it on the list but never expect any guarantees.
